Reviews.Title: Great picture great price
Reviews.Author: Eric Meyers
Reviews.Content: Pros: Easy setup, great price, great vibrant colors and blacks, works well with sound bar that comes with the TV, The TV took about 5 min to setup from out of the box to actually watching the TV.  Picture looks amazing even over my previous 1080p LCD Toshiba TV.  Sound bar is very easy to setup and comes with the optical cable already in the box.Cons: Not Wifi ready out of the box (need an adapter) and placement of the HDMI Ports.  This could be me just nitpicking but for a Smart  TV not to be wifi ready is a little annoying and the HDMI spots cause the cords to stick out from the side of the TV unless wire managed.Overall this is a great TV for the price even after looking around for other TVs in the same price range.  I am extremely happy with my purchase

Reviews.Title: After a month of use, I couldn't be happier with the purchase
Reviews.Author: Zamazon
Reviews.Content: I picked this up for the (somewhat large) studio apartment I am sharing with my fiancee.  After having it for about a month, I really couldn't be happier.The picture:As some others mentioned, certain settings can give video a "soap opera" quality, where humans seem a bit too real and sets appear to be, well, sets.  This reminded me of when I first saw the Hobbit in theaters.  It's not necessarily a bad effect at all times--it just speaks to the size of the screen and the incredible refresh and vividness of the display.  In any case, however, you can easily diminish that effect by adjusting the color scheme and trumotion settings.  Both are painless to fiddle and the TV remembers your settings on a HDMI input basis, so you can have one custom setting for your bluray, one for your roku, one for your game system, etc.  This has worked very well for me and I'm still amazed by the quality I get from all inputs.The sound:I use the bar and it works very well for me.  1/4th volume more than fills my studio apt.  The sound is also very clear and has good dynamic range to my ears.  Using it to play pandora in the background works very nicely, for example, and I've never had issues with distortion or any such thing during loud scenes in movies.  I did have one random incident where the TV had trouble syncing with the sound bar (after the sound bar had automatically powered down while I fiddled with the TV settings and features), but that was remedied by shutting both the TV and sound bar off and on again.  I never had another incident like that again.  I'm not sure if that's because I rarely have my TV on for extended periods without sound (thus allowing the sound bar to power down) or because a recent software update to the TV fixed the sync problems.  Whatever the reason, I find the sound bar to be a great addition.The features:Since I have a roku, I honestly don't use the smart TV features much.  When I do, however, they seem to work fine.  Using my ipad as a remote (easy to set up with a free app), it's quite easy to browse the internet or use services like Netflix and Hulu.  I purchased the roku at the same time as the TV and slightly prefer its navigation and universal search, but I think anyone could get by just using the smart TV features here.  They are quite nice and LG seems to update the system relatively frequently.All in all, I highly recommend this combo pack.  I don't review much on here, but this has really surpassed my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: darrin j. ficke
Reviews.Content: TV has great picture and easy to use Smart Apps.  Unfortunately Amazon did not say the wireless dongle did not come with the TV.  Had to order dongle from Amazon so the Smart TV would actually be Smart!

Reviews.Title: LG 47in TV
Reviews.Author: Matthew D. Baker
Reviews.Content: Setup was quick and easy.  Supplied sound bar is loud and clear. Very satisfied with purchase and would recommend this product to others.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, Need LG Dongle apparatus to use wireless
Reviews.Author: Tigerlily13
Reviews.Content: Great picture! Major annoyance is that you have to buy a separate apparatus, an LG Dongle, to equip this so-called smart tv for wireless. What?

Reviews.Title: TV is fine, but sound is lacking.
Reviews.Author: Doug Kennedy
Reviews.Content: The free sound bar is, however, "ho-hum".  The internal speakers work better.  To really get the most out of my purchase, I would have to buy about $500 more in theatre sound equipment.

Reviews.Title: Good set for the living room
Reviews.Author: Donald F.
Reviews.Content: Good clear picture and good sound.  I was a little disappointed with the sound bar.  Not a whole lot different than the normal TV.  I was expecting better.

Reviews.Title: Beware of the "Smart TV" - DHS security update
Reviews.Author: J.M.B.
Reviews.Content: Beware of the "Smart TV"Today's  DHS daily email referred me to this article which states that LG Smart TV's are collecting personal info and sending it back to LG servers… From the article: "However, even if the feature is disabled, information from the LG Smart TV is still sent back to LG's servers."LG's response: " the retailer who sold the TV should have made customers aware of the Terms and Conditions associated with the use of the device."Here is the article: [...]

Reviews.Title: A real review its great but glare can be bad though! Updated
Reviews.Author: M. J. "Metal maniac"
Reviews.Content: I could not find any reviews on this TV before i bought it.Pro's:Its a great LG TV for the price and if you don't think the double 10W TV speakers do the trick the FREE 60W sound bar you might think its better, but if you have 5.1 or up its just no match. Just about everything is amazing on this LG TV the Picture,colors and white & black looks fantastic! No sound sync problems either and i was shocked at the LG apps they're awesome some are pre-installed too...Free movies(Crackle),free games(CC required) & a web browser that looks fantastic & works great too! It can do a whole lot more!!!!Con's:The Glare can be pretty bad in the right spots & with white walls with a light source near them you can see it on the TV pretty bad, but i recommend the room to have a low light setting. A bright room without a light source near the TV. (Picture looks awesome with HDMI cable box & Xbox 360 without glare) Also wish it had S-video hook-up or coax for DVD player. I had my Xbox 360 hooked up to the Component part with the green,red and blue cord that came with my Xbox 360 and it gave me a pretty bad ghosting image effect on the TV but when hooked up with HDMI its crystal clear amazing HD image no ghosting at all ( still not sure if its my cord or the LG TV's in general as it did do the same ghosting thing on another LG when the 360 was hooked up with ComponentIll update this as needed also Amazons tech support and CS are awesome love shopping online at amazon!** Fixed some info above. Update 1 month+: **The sound bar is NOT better than the Tv speakers when Smartsound is turned on with volume options set on high(wide) its better than the sound bar IMO. I was wrong about free movies unless you use crackle or an app like it. Unfortunately i'm still unable to test a newXbox 360 Component HD AV Cable as my old one gave me horrible ghost image on two different LG TV's if and when i do get a new cable i'll update again. My 5.1 wont work right when hooked up with digital audio from the TV to the receiver, but it worked when it was hooked up through the Xbox 360 component HD AV Cable via digital audio cable to the receiver just my luck also my 5.1 isn't HDMI sadly its kinda old too, but its always had some problems so it could just be my 5.1 not sure. All in all the picture still looks amazing on Xbox & HD Cable. I'm still loving it i'm still happy i bought it! My Girlfriend says she wants to steal my TV because its looks so much better than hers :P

Reviews.Title: nice display
Reviews.Author: Edwards Tavarez
Reviews.Content: not bad for the LED display TV, i just wish LG did better with the remote control.... the navigation control is not as user friendly as i was expecting.

Reviews.Title: Great  value for the price
Reviews.Author: MSS
Reviews.Content: Great value - excellent picture -good sound with and without the included sound bar. Set up took one half hour -just follow on screen directions.Only one negative is that one must buy a wireless dongle to connect with your internet service ( just another way to get $25 to $50 out of the customer). LG should have incorporated that capability like other major producers have.Have had the TV for 3 weeks, no problems, a very good product.

Reviews.Title: Sound bar problems
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: Had some serious problems with the sound bar that comes with this TV. When turning on the TV the sound bar would go to maximum volume on its own and would not respond to the remote. The sound level could be set at zero and bar is still at full blast. I went through all the usual trouble shooting, but the problem continued. This problem was intermittent but very annoying. I returned the TV and sound bar. The sound quality of the bar is mediocre at best. Another issue with sound is that you can't use the graphic equalizer in the TV with any external speakers, not even with a matched LG sound bar. On the plus side the TV picture was beautiful. The owners manual was so bad it was almost funny. This is my first experience with a LG product. Disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Karla Wilson
Reviews.Content: Awesome, nice picture, great sound and nice price.  I would recommend this product to anyone.  Amazon was very helpful as well.

Reviews.Title: most apps and internet
Reviews.Author: A. Jarnegan
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product after I bought the 55in LG 3d tv. the smart tv is really the thing to have. you get plenty of apps  like vudo,net flix, you tube and also the internet. you get the color wizard for the best color. if there was anything I didn't like ,it would be the remote control,but I got use to operating it and now I'm truly satisfied. one more thing you will also need to purchase the  LG AN-WF100  WIFI -USB ADAPTOR This enables your wifi .purchase them together so they arrive together.its a bummer hanging the tv  and having to wait for the wifi adaptor.

Reviews.Title: Big & Beautiful!
Reviews.Author: DCofWV
Reviews.Content: This TV is an upgrade from a 46" Samsung Smart TV (the built-in wireless sensor stopped working 1 week out of warrantee, and after 3 weeks, Samsung has STILL not provided a repair service!!).  Clear, crisp picture, sound bar provides great, rich sound.  Reviews I had read indicated that LG's TV sound quality is not as good as other brands, but the sound bar certainly takes care of that issue. Only drawback is the description did not clearly state the need for a separately purchased USB WiFi dongle, although, after the Samsung experience, I'm glad it's a replaceable add-on rather than a built-in.Installation and start up instructions were clear enough - and THAT'S when we realized we had to purchase the wifi dongle; it would be a good idea for Amazon to bundle the thing in with the TV & sound bar.I was not pleased with the delivery - subcontractors were clueless - but Amazon made thing right.

Reviews.Title: nice t.v.
Reviews.Author: gary
Reviews.Content: T.v. has a great picture, internet apps seem to work fine, sound bar is better then built in speakers. Only negative is no built in WiFi.

Reviews.Title: Soundbar is clunky, Trumotion won't completely shut off, and LG collects personal data without permission, and serves ads
Reviews.Author: Erawl
Reviews.Content: The Good:* The screen is big and beautiful. No issues here.* The apps work well, and it has Netflix and other 3rd-party content providers. Great!The Bad:* The soundbar was difficult to manage. It has its own on/off control, and does not sync with the TV power (sometimes it worked, sometimes not). Most of the time I had to get up and walk across the room to power on the soundbar to hear the TV. This is not a quality experience.* Trumotion is LG's version of the technology to insert additional video frames between source frames to make the picture seem smoother. Some like it, some hate it (I'm the latter). There is a setting to disable it, but it re-enables itself whenever I watch Netflix. I find Trumotion distracting, and I have to re-disable it every time. Again, not a quality experience.The Ugly:* LG serves you ads (yes, ads on the TV you just purchased at full price). This is not a discounted or subsidized TV. This is a full retail, full price version. There was no indication from Amazon that ads would be displayed, so I did not expect to see ads. Shame on LG.* LG collects your personal viewing habits (shows you watch, channels, services, etc) and filenames stored on any external storage you attach to the TV or on a shared network drive, and sends them to LG's servers without your permission. No, I am not kidding. There is a setting in the preferences called "Collection of watching info". You can set this to off, but the TV still collects your data and uploads to their servers. Shame on LG! In a very public mea culpa, LG promised to "fix the bug" in a future firmware update.See these articles:[...][...]Just google "lg collecting data" for the entire disgusting story.To not be spied on by LG, your options here include:- Not buying this or any LG TV- Not connecting your LG TV to the internet (difficult if your whole point is to stream Netflix and the like)- Tolerating LG's wanton disregard for your privacy, and allowing them to collect whatever data they want and use as they see fit/sell to whomever, for profit, without compensating you- Waiting for the firmware update that addresses the issue and keep your LG TV off of your home network and the internet until you've applied the update.You've been warned.

Reviews.Title: Got a great deal! Amazing picture!
Reviews.Author: Tigersfan945
Reviews.Content: Got this TV from Tigerdirect.com for only $600.  TV sold out quick!  I am more than happy with my purchase.  The picture is really clear.  I am not very tech savvy when it comes to TV's, but if you are looking for a good quality HDTV, you have found the perfect one.

Reviews.Title: Works like it should
Reviews.Author: gabriel cano
Reviews.Content: Everything works great the color is deep great tv.  Sometimes the soundbar will go crazy and want to go max volume on start up which is why 4 stars but this in no way effects performance, it is just annoying.

Reviews.Title: New Model Curse
Reviews.Author: Ryan Prickette
Reviews.Content: The TV itself is beautiful.  Incredibly sharp picture.  Great value.I was really excited to get the sound bar up and running, but unfortunately it wasn't functional from day 1.  After a long troubleshooting call with LG support, they determined I would need to send the sound bar in for repairs.  This is all covered under the warranty, of course, but I believe this is simply a case of working the kinks out of a new model.  So far, LG has been accommodating and offered good customer support.  Here's hoping I eventually get everything I've paid for.

Reviews.Title: Great Smart TV
Reviews.Author: MarissaK
Reviews.Content: It's "SMART" it plugs and calibrates right away, was super easy to start up and set-up, it was a little confused because we don't have any cable/channels, we only use DVD/Netflix/Does not have an app for HBO - think you can get around this by using the internet browserWould be really awesome w/ a key board and or mouse - in the process of getting one, typing with the remote control is just silly.You can sync it with a tablet or portable device, which is cool, because then you can use it to watch youtube videos and control it from the tablet, which makes searching for things really easyOverall, great buy, great quality, easy to set-up

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: Great TV at an affordable price.Would recommend this.Has lots of options and is very easy to navigate.Buy now.Maddox

Reviews.Title: LG Electronics
Reviews.Author: Michael A. Barton
Reviews.Content: The TV was packaged very secure; however, it took a while receiving from the POS.  The TV was easy to put together and the picture is amazing.  I feel as though I'm on the TV/movie set while it's being filmed.  It's weird because I'm not used to it, but the clarity is brilliant.  I have not used the sound bar since I have a Bose sound system so I can't comment on the "free sound bar."  The only thing I wish I knew was the DONGLE that's required to make it smart.  I found LG's Dongle an Amazon and bought that for around $30, which came 3 days later (after Christmas).  Now the TV is the focal point in the living room.

Reviews.Title: LG 55" TV
Reviews.Author: Hyon Lee
Reviews.Content: The TV is perfect!!!  I can't begin to explain how wonderful the picture quality is.  you just have to see it!!!!

Reviews.Title: Shipping problems

Reviews.Content: I was unable to work with the company to find a reasonable delivery time and had such a hassle, I had to return the TV. It took over a month to have my money returned to me. Needless to say, I was not happy to be out $700 for a month and a half . . .

Reviews.Content: I purchased this item for the 120Hz refresh rate.  I was a little skeptical when none of the packaging said anything about the 120Hz.  Sure enough the manufacturer label says 60Hz!  I guess I learned my lesson! wont be buying another tv from Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Sound bar is useless

Reviews.Title: Great TV

Reviews.Title: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS TV ONLINE
Reviews.Author: michael raia
Reviews.Content: I purchased this television for a conference room. After un-boxing i realized the screen is cracked. When i re-boxed TV to file claim I realized the packing material sets just below top of TV bezel which created a pressure crack in panel. Since it has been more than 30 days since I purchased the set there is no recourse i could take with vendor. When I called LG support they made NO attempt to recognize or help remedy the situation. Needless to say I have a very negative opinion of LG products and their support staff.  I have photos of packing defect if anyone is interested to see the problem. BEWARE.

Reviews.Title: LG 55 inch TV

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Andrew R.
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price, clear picture, great sound with the sound bar.  Easy set up.  Happy with all aspects of the TV.

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: jack s
Reviews.Content: After a while of tinkering with the picture settings the image is fantastic. For gaming though be sure to put out in game mode and make sure the trumotion is off. It still has some input lag but it's not unplayable in first person shooters online play. The sound bar is nothing fancy but it makes sounds so mission accomplished

Reviews.Title: 2 for 1
Reviews.Author: Richard Ballard
Reviews.Content: LG has become one of the top rated manufacturers of electronics now and the satisfaction was expected! But bigger is better.

Reviews.Title: big thumbs up
Reviews.Author: Carista
Reviews.Content: this was a really good buy with bitcoins over the holiday, deffinetly worth getting if you need to upgrade your tv and can afford it.

Reviews.Title: Life is even better now.
Reviews.Author: RRM
Reviews.Content: Yowza. What a picture. This takes sports to a new level. Concerts, oh baby. What is anyone gonna need 4K for?

Reviews.Title: I am very much enjoy this TV
Reviews.Author: Silvina
Reviews.Content: Ive had the old box TV for quite a while needed something new finally. This is everything i was looking for. Great quality and features. Sound bar def a plus but runs separate form the tv remote (and cable remote) kind of a pain. The Volume buttons are kind of sensitive on it and sometimes i can't even turn it on so ill just use the TV volume.

Reviews.Title: Great TV great price!

Reviews.Content: I love this tv! After I set the tv up I was disappointed in the display a little but, after i changed the settings off of power saving mode it was Beautiful! everything is crisp and clear and the movement is great! the soundbar is a little disappointing but hey, it is free so I am not going to review that.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the money
Reviews.Author: joel
Reviews.Content: The TV picture is great. It's nice and thin and comes with a stand or you can mount it for pretty cheap. The sound bar is just alright, doesn't get too loud but definitely does the job. I find the soundbar will turn on and off sometimes when switching inputs which is kind of annoying. The smart TV apps are pretty good has your standard amazon, Netflix, huh, Pandora apps. Comes with an Internet browser but it is kind of hard to use because there is no keyboard on the remote. It doesn't come with wifi or bluetooth so you will have to buy a dongle for that. Overall I've had the TV now for about two months and am pretty happy with my purchase. Besides what I mentioned above everything about the TV is pretty awesome.

Reviews.Title: Very beautiful picture

Reviews.Content: High quality in everything about this beautiful TV buying experience. Amazon did it again for me with the best TV with sound bar,best price, best delivery. I looked everywhere and Amazon had this LG TV including sound bar at the far and away best price.This is our second LG TV with sound bar and the quality of the fit and finish, the picture, and sound is just outstanding.This was hand delivered as promised to my living room unpacked, tested and all the boxes removed.Great job Amazon!!!

Reviews.Title: love it!!!!!!

Reviews.Content: I love my new tv!!!!!!! I can't believe the things that I notice now in movies and tv shows that I hadn't noticed before.

Reviews.Title: All good!!!

Reviews.Content: Great picture!!! Great sound with or without the free sound bar. Easy set up. All good; no complaints here! Would certainly recommend this T.V..

Reviews.Title: TV work good, the sound bar 1 star
Reviews.Author: Chinh N.
Reviews.Content: I got the TV for living room also keep economic moving on black friday, the TV work well, lately I use LG app to sesrch the net watch so MN e youtube... work very well, the sound bar have very low volume, I end up use TV buildin speaker untill I can get a better SB to replade for the one come with the TV

Reviews.Content: I love this TV. I love everything about it. I don't know anything about Sound Bars but the one that came with this sounds awesome to me!

Reviews.Title: Skip the soundbar.
Reviews.Author: DAVE CAPUS
Reviews.Content: Great picture. Screen is a little shiny like a plasma tv. Better for dark rooms. Soundbar not worth it. Sound out of tv is better.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "jpdavis79"
Reviews.Content: Magic tv. This is a good value, it was group gift for elderly relatives. If you want the WiFi capabilities, you need to also order the doggle. The LG site says it is included with this model, but it is not advertised as included by Amazon and was not included.

Reviews.Title: LG TV

Reviews.Content: I would have given this five stars but the sound bar is a mess, it sounds terrible and the volume button does not work on it. When you try to change channels it just gets louder and louder. It also does not have PIP.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT

Reviews.Title: Love the tv

Reviews.Content: Never having had a quality tv before, I really love this one. Navigating smart tv features are easy.The sound-bar isn't  wonderful. 3 stars for it

Reviews.Title: Buy LG product reliability is high.
Reviews.Author: jangdoil
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is good and the sound is also satisfied. The trust has been to purchase LG products are not high. There seems to be a good use of it.

Reviews.Title: Good picture
Reviews.Author: Carleen Edwards "Edwardsmom"
Reviews.Content: We will have to work on getting the picture quality fine-tuned but we are enjoying it s far. The sound bar does not stay on when selected as the main source of sound...another setting I am sure we need to learn. A lot of learning about the settings which are complex to us since we are not techies but we don't have regular TV or cable and only use it for movies so we will learn as we go. Picture good and cost better than we saw in stores.

Reviews.Title: Love my TV!
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: Replaced an old Panasonic plasma in our bedroom with this larger LED Smart TV. I love the picture and I love the access to the net and all of the things offered there. The Smart Tv was easy to set up and use. The 60 watt sound bar that was included works well for the size of the room it is in.The picture is great. I got a great bargain on this TV and I am very happy with it and Amazon's delivery of it..

Reviews.Title: No wifi
Reviews.Author: satisfied customer
Reviews.Content: This unit needs a separate/ additional wifi dongle to get the smart TV to work.The sound bar is puny looks like a piece of 2x4.The item never arrived on time, I had to track it down...Amazon said lost in transit. Then pretended to order it  for one day delivery so that I could still have it before Christmas...idiomatic get it until after Christmas...poor, poor,poor Amazon

Reviews.Title: Nice for the price!
Reviews.Author: SenorFlatfoot
Reviews.Content: Nice tv and size. Took one star for the lack of built in WiFi.  Although I knew it buying it, would have been a good feature to have.

Reviews.Title: not impressed with the audio
Reviews.Author: F. B. Hofmann
Reviews.Content: Audio is disappointing. The sound out of the TV itself is very tinny and the sound bar isn't a whole lot better. I can't use my surround sound because of the optical output of the system. I'm in the process of locating a optical converter for it.

Reviews.Title: Great smart tv
Reviews.Author: julie gwinner
Reviews.Content: Great purchase.  Picture is great and sound bar adds a great touch.  Love watching movies on this tv and would recommend

Reviews.Title: Clear & bright
Reviews.Author: Michael coughlin
Reviews.Content: Great viewing from any where in the room. Installation was easy to follow. Set-up was a breeze. A quality product

Reviews.Title: Great Picture.  Didn't need sound bar.
Reviews.Author: allaboutal
Reviews.Content: What I liked:Great picture out of box.  I haven't had time to optimize the display yet, but l will (will probably do with the utility that's included in the Finding Nemo CD).Really like the Smart TV features, and after owning for about 3 weeks now have only scratched the surface of what it can do.  It has an Ethernet port.  It detects our PC on the same network (when it's on) and it looks like I'll be able to view pictures and video/ movies, and music loaded on my PC, which I'm definitely going to look into further.Size.  I was targeting a 42" TV for this room but ended up buying this 47" model, and happy I did.  It doesn't overwhelm the room, and the image is stunning.  Very small frame around the picture.What I didn't like:Getting a sound bar, since I already got a 5.1 surround system.  But at the time I couldn't find another TV I wanted, for the price at this size and feature set.  I made the best of it by selling the unopened sound bar on Craigslist.Had to buy an digital audio optical cable to get the ARC (audio return channel) feature to work with my Receiver and HDMI cable.  I now see that cable may have been in the sound bar box.No built in WiFi.  I initially didn't mind this, since I planned on using an Ethernet cable, but to take advantage of the WiDi, wireless linking to mobile devices, I have to go wireless with the TV as well. Overall, very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV but not the sound bar
Reviews.Author: Paul Levine
Reviews.Content: I spent a long time researching TVs before ordering this and I couldn't have been happier with my choice. The picture is bright and perfectly clear. Live sports look fantastic with no blurring.I didn't really think I would use the Smart TV features since I already owned a streaming media player, but I love them! The system is easy to use and the apps are great!I could leave the sound bar. It is a mild improvement over the built-in speakers but with only two channels and no subwoofer it doesn't offer as much of an improvement as I'd like.

Reviews.Title: Nice LG TV
Reviews.Author: James K. Lee
Reviews.Content: Come with wrong optical cable.Overall LG TV quality is good,  but the interface (internet) need improvement. Installation is easy.

Reviews.Title: Soundbar
Reviews.Author: Alan C Hale
Reviews.Content: Soundbar no better than built-in speakers.  Color very hard to adjust. Do like the size of the TV.  Probably would not buy LG again.

Reviews.Title: GOOD SMART TV
Reviews.Author: JOEY35
Reviews.Content: Picture is terrific. Sound is strong if you use the HDMI connection. I first did not have an HDMI cable so I used component connection. The sound was weak. Now I have an HDMI cable and do not use the sound bar. The TV sound is good.However, my wife uses TVEARS to help her understand the dialogue. The only sound out is the optical digital connection. I had to buy a digi-analog converter ( About $50) to plug into the optical outlet. Unfortunately, the system is designed so you must have it configured to "external sound", not the TV speakers, if you want the sound to come out the optical outlet. This means that I also use the TVEARS since that is the only sound..... Not a real big deal, but they could have had a "both" TV speakers and external setting.

Reviews.Title: TV was busted!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "suebaby"
Reviews.Content: I am unable to review the television, since it was totally busted when it arrived, so I will review the shippers.DO NOT BUY ANYTHING SHIPPED BY AIRGROUP!!!!!! Not only was the television useless, but this company was impossible to work with for returns. I actually had to leave the busted tv on the front porch to make sure it got picked up. Fortunately, I live in a decent neighborhood!Also, Lively Delivery was very inflexible in working with me on the return of this television.

Reviews.Title: sound bar doesn't work
Reviews.Author: JIM
Reviews.Content: TV is fine but sound bar does not work. shipping was prompt and easy to set up.Price seems to be a little high since sound bar doesn't work. To bulky to return.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Monica J Stephens
Reviews.Content: The cable that came with the TV for the sound bar was defective and I had to purchase a new one.  Wasn't sending the whole TV back for a cable.  Also, feel that the TV should have came with the dongle or should have advised that one would be necessary to use the smart TV function.  Really disappointed that was not made clear in the description for the TV.

Reviews.Title: Ace TV, not so great sound bar
Reviews.Author: Bikegirl
Reviews.Content: We love the TV, it's easy to set up.We took review advise and bought the wireless dongle at the same time. Very easy.We're not keen on the sound bar. We can't seem to select both TV sound and the sound bar together, and there's not much to chose between them quality wise, so what's the point? We need to get an amp and decent speakers to get a proper home cinema set up.

Reviews.Title: cool tv
Reviews.Author: Dwight
Reviews.Content: i don't have too many experiences w/ purchasing a tv. but the quality is great. light. fits perfect in my room.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: MSAmazon
Reviews.Content: This TV is everything I wanted, the smart features are wonderful and the ability to play any form of video I can throw at it on a flash drive plays seamlessly. The only issue I had was figuring out how to reduce the input lag for games to nothing, after tinkering with the setting I managed to figure it out.The sound bar does what it's supposed to, clear sound, and good quality, but nothing spectacular (can't argue with free though.)All in all, I would definitely purchase this TV again if I had the option as well as recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Just the right size
Reviews.Author: Lu Ann Sieber
Reviews.Content: Arrived a day earlier than expected.  Looks beautiful even when not on.  great picture and easy set-up..and for us, just the right size.

Reviews.Title: LG Monitors your browsing history and logs USB file names
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: http://doctorbeet.blogspot.ru/2013/11/lg-smart-tvs-logging-usb-filenames-and.htmlTV looks great and works great, WIFI doesn't come built in. I found this link the day after I received the TV. Sadly we as consumers just have to accept that we don't have any privacy.

Reviews.Title: on a budget?  get this one
Reviews.Author: Joel Keenan "Joel Keenan"
Reviews.Content: I had the same size TV using LCD, not LED, technology, and it worked for a few years and then, one day, the old TV screen, right in the middle of a show, slowly turned 100% white.  It was as if I watched it go to Heaven.Oh Well.  So I went on Amazon which is where I buy EVERYTHING (thanks Jeff Bezos, you're a freaking genius and I haven't been in a department store for 5 years, you're awesome, I love you man), and compared, and bought the LG 47LN5790, my first "smart" tv.3 weeks later, here's the deal:  Thanks Jeff Bezos!  You did it again you crazy balding genius.  I love you man.  The picture is really nice, it looks better than my old LCD tv did.  The sound bar seems a little hokey but it works fine.  I don't know why it has to be separate from the tv, but whatever.The main thing is this "smart" tv stuff.  This is a big improvement.  Now, I have easy access to Amazon instant video and to Netflix, and I can access these things without using the HIDEOUS Wii controller I had to use in order to watch things on Netflix.Have you ever used a Wii controller?  What's THAT about?  I felt like Katherine Hepburn!  The damned thing waves all over the place and you spend 10 minutes trying to click on something.Here's the point:  this is a nice tv at a nice price.  It does what it says it does.  The picture is very nice.  I'm glad I got it.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture But The Soundbar Lacks!
Reviews.Author: MiracleDaddy
Reviews.Content: This is an astonishing television, but I couldn't help but notice the sound bar...I just think this entire thing could have been a couple hundred dollars cheaper with a better sound bar. The Wifi options are also extremely limited because you need to pick up an adapter to actually get it to work. Amazon makes that very clear but I almost didn't want to believe it.I actually take offense to the idea that this sound bar is considered "Free". Was the guy who brought the sound bar to my door paid for picking it up? So what if it was in the box; somebody still has to get paid to lug this tinny mother around.Luckily it takes no time to set this television up and it is really easy to move around. And the Wifi works great, of course, once you get that adapter going. Never has youtube pixellation/buffering looked so clear to me! Oh, and if you're planning on plugging your PS3 up to this it has HDMI input so as long as you have an HDMI cable you'll be good to go.Over all this is a nice product but I wish I had thought twice about the "free" sound bar. 60 watts isn't very impressive at all and I wish I had maybe bought a cheaper tv and then maybe a replacement sound system for the living room to go with it.One last note: TruMotion so I don't know about the rest of you all but sports are nonparalleled on a tv like this. It makes it hard to watch channels that don't support TruMotion because it looks SO. GOOD. when FoxSports or another provider grabs the proverbial bull by the horns and ekes the most out of their broadcast. Hopefully when football comes back around we can see just how good this tv can really be.

Reviews.Title: disapointed for the LG 55 inch
Reviews.Author: Raymond G. Rhoden "oktbear-shopper"
Reviews.Content: Rather disapointed,  Smart TV isn't very smart.  First had to purchase the WI-FI dongle to even attempt to make it smart.  After installation still doesn't connect to the wi-fi very well.  Unable to watch any movies because of the poor speed of the dongle.  Picture is good but not as good as what I expected.  My 42 inch Visio is better.  Lesson learned.  Never buy a new TV without watching it for a while first.

Reviews.Title: Likes and Dislikes
Reviews.Author: Peggy W. Alley
Reviews.Content: What I dislike : No closed caption capability.Written instructions are not very useful.What I liked: Picture is very good.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous!
Reviews.Author: Mgirl "My Girl"
Reviews.Content: Love, love this TV. Great picture and sound.I seems like the actors are in the room with you.Fanatastic.

Reviews.Title: Bad Price!
Reviews.Author: Virgnia Wright
Reviews.Content: Best Buy has the 55 inch for this price…Amazon used to be competitive but not now.  Also do not even try to do a price match! They will only match regular price…not a sale price. I even had proof of sale price because I put the item in my cart. Screen shotted. And Best Buy is on their list they will match with. Not true. Don't pass up the deal somewhere else waiting on them to get back to you. They will not match it.

Reviews.Title: not just a tv
Reviews.Author: John Wolff
Reviews.Content: it really is a great tv and worth every dollar.I put a hard disk on the back and  connected it to the internet and it is much more than a tv now.John Wolff

Reviews.Title: LG Electronics 47LN5790 47-Inch 1080p 120Hz Smart LED HDTV + Free 60-Watt sound bar
Reviews.Author: Jeff D. Jennings
Reviews.Content: LG Electronics 47LN5790 47-Inch 1080p 120Hz Smart LED HDTV + Free 60-Watt sound bar.  Everything we expected at a good price.

Reviews.Title: SOUND BAR "SUCKS,"  but the TV IS GREAT.  Don't get this deal unless you are willing to toss this sound bar out and buy another.
Reviews.Author: donbsea
Reviews.Content: TV IS GREAT.  No problem with the TV at all..........THE SOUND BAR SUCKS.  IT'S HORRIBLE DESIGN SOUND BAR.PROBLEM is this particular LG SOUND BAR that's inc. w/TV . IT SUCKS.  After two or three mins of the TV put into MUTE, or the streaming movie/DVD is put on hold/pause.....this stupid model sound bar SHUTS OFF.Automatically. SHUTS OFF.Called LG and was advised that there is no way alter this, it's just the way it's designed. Said it was "for safety," and "energy savings."  WHAT A CROCK OF HORSE POO.I expressed my frustration, and was politely told that she, (the service rep), would forward "my concerns" to the higher ups.Swell.Spoke w/Amazon and was told that as the sound bar was more or less "thrown into the deal with this TV," and that I could return both the TV and sound bar, or try to sell the sound bar on Craigs List, buy another model sound bar to replace this one with.Which I think that's what I will do.  I do like the TV a lot, not interested in taking it down, repacking it, and waiting for UPS to pick it up.
